HEADLINE:
In Compliance with Regulation 30(2) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Enclosed is a copy of transcript of the earnings conference call of the results for the quarter ended June 30, 2019 held on Thursday, August 01, 2019 at 11.00 a.m.
The same is available on website- www.careratings.com.

Request you to take the same on records and oblige.
